p: Sumoylation and ubiquitination assays were performed as described ( 43). Briefly, HEK293T cells were co-transfected with the indicated plasmids (Figure 7) using calcium phosphate reagent. Cells were cultured in Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium (Gibco, Gaithersburg, MD, USA) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (Gibco) with 5% CO 2 at 37°C for 30 h and then lysed for western blotting and IP. The lysates were centrifuged at 16 000 × g at 4°C for 10 min. 50 μl of protein G Dynabeads was incubated with 10 μg of indicated antibody for 20 min, followed by incubation with the cell lysate for 25 min. The complexes were washed several times with PBST (PBS with 0.02% Tween 20) and were subjected to western blotting.
